meanings.sent1: The farmer sold calfskins to the tannery.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bag made of soft calfskins.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy chewed on the calfskins, thinking they were a toy.
meanings.sent4: The calfskins gleamed under the sunlight, a testament to their quality.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh calfskins filled the workshop, inspiring the craftsmen.

meanings.definition: A type of leather made from the skin of a calf.
meanings.sent1: The shoemaker used calfskins to craft elegant shoes.
meanings.sent2: The jacket was made of luxurious calfskins.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer dyed the calfskins in vibrant colors for a unique look.
meanings.sent4: Her purse, made of calfskins, was a symbol of sophistication.
meanings.sent5: The softness of the calfskins made the gloves a pleasure to wear.
